title: Pablo Escobar (footballer, born 1979)
summary:
Pablo Daniel Escobar Olivetti (Spanish pronunciation: [ˈpaβlo eskoˈβaɾ], born 23 February 1979) is a football coach and former player who played as an attacking midfielder or second striker. He is the current manager of the Bolivia national under-20 team.
Born in Paraguay, Escobar represented Bolivia at international level.
